text: I just tried to get you over to [PERSON_NAME], but it looks like he has stepped away for just a moment.

text: But I would love to help you out.

text: So I see you'bringing in your C class for service, it looks like on Monday, is that right?

speaker: agent
text: Okay, perfect.

text: Well, I know [PERSON_NAME] was definitely trying to reach out to you because our [OCCUPATION] [OCCUPATION] has been looking for more of these C class models.

text: And we see you have your [DATE_INTERVAL].

text: Yeah, but I've got such a good deal on the car.

text: It's.

text: I mean, for what I'm paying, I don't know.

text: I mean, because my payment includes prepaid maintenance.

speaker: agent
text: It has the extended warranty, the car payment, the interest rate, and other things.

text: And plus, it's only got, you know, 20, 29,000 miles on it.

text: Yeah, definitely.

text: And that low mileage is so something we are certainly looking for.

speaker: agent
text: I mean, if it was something that we could get you a great offer on.

text: I don't know.

text: [MONEY_AMOUNT].

text: Yeah, I mean, like I said, I'd be open to it.

text: It's just, like I said, it's a matter of, you know, I don't.

text: So if anything happens to my tires or my rims, I just.

text: That.

text: Exactly.

text: Well, hey, if you were looking at another C class, is there anything that you wish was kind of different with yours?

text: I mean, I'm so anal about my car.

text: I just.

text: Yeah, like I said, it's in really, really good shape.

text: I know you said pretty much there's nothing you can think of, but if there was anything that you would could add into your next class, is there anything that kind of comes to mind?

text: I mean, like I said, this is my third one, so it'you I had an E350 coup and then another C class before C300, before this one and then this one's the formatic, so I'd want to keep that obviously.

text: But I know I don't really want to get an A class.

speaker: agent
text: I don'and.

text: Like I said, I. I don know it's just going to be a hard deal to beat at all.

text: And I know you said it is in that good condition and it does have that low mileage as well as you kind of having those different packages.

text: So I know it is something that my [OCCUPATION] [OCCUPATION] would be interested in.

speaker: agent
text: So let me just ask, when you come in for service on Monday, are you waiting with your vehicle or are you dropping it off?

text: Before you leave, do you think you would have just [DURATION] [DURATION] [DURATION] [DURATION] to meet with my [OCCUPATION] [OCCUPATION] just to get a value for your vehicle as well as maybe seeing some options if you're interested?
